statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); os_icon=$([ -f /etc/os-release ] && . /etc/os-release && case "$ID" in ubuntu) echo "󰕈";; fedora) echo "󰣛";; arch) echo "󰣇";; debian) echo "󰣚";; *) echo "󰌽";; esac || echo "󰌽"); git_info=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null && git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | head -1 | sed 's/.*/●/' || echo ''); short_cwd=$(echo "$cwd" | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); [ ${#short_cwd} -gt 40 ] && short_cwd="…/$(basename "$cwd")"; printf '\033[01;32m%s %s@%s\033[00m:\033[01;34m%s\033[00m' "$os_icon" "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$short_cwd"; [ -n "$git_info" ] && printf '\033[00;36m  %s\033[00m' "$git_info"
